work.summary: ML Engineer on Bridgewater Associates' AIA Labs team, developing AI and ML systems for systematic alpha generation in global macro markets. Focus on large-language-model agents and reinforcement-learning pipelines for economic reasoning and policy simulation.
highlights: Developed LLM-augmented research workflows for factor discovery
Built reinforcement-learning pipelines for economic reasoning
Collaborated with academic researchers on AI for macro markets

work.summary: Applied statistical learning to multi-asset data and helped prototype factor-discovery tools for the equities desk.
highlights: Applied statistical learning to multi-asset data
Prototyped factor-discovery tools for equities desk

papers.name: Inertial Navigation System Drift Reduction Using Scientific Machine Learning
papers.summary: Master's thesis on reducing inertial navigation system drift using scientific machine learning.

papers.name: Evaluating the Performance of GPT-3 in Simulated Cybersecurity Scenarios: A Focus on Graph-Based Problems
papers.summary: This paper evaluates the performance of GPT-3 in simulated cybersecurity scenarios, focusing on graph-based problems.
